00013 COptions::COptions(Uint8 dlg_theme, stOption *p_option) :
00014 CBaseMenu(dlg_theme),
00015 mp_option(p_option)
00016 {
00017  int i;
00018  std::string buf;
00019 
00020  mp_Dialog = new CDialog(27, NUM_OPTIONS+2, INPUT_MODE_UP_DOWN, dlg_theme);
00021  
00022  for( i = 0 ; i < NUM_OPTIONS ; i++ )
00023  {
00024   mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, i+1, "");
00025   buf = mp_option[i].menuname + " ";
00026   buf += (mp_option[i].value) ? 28 : 20;
00027   buf += (mp_option[i].value) ? 29 : 21;
00028   buf += (mp_option[i].value) ? 30 : 22;
00029   buf += (mp_option[i].value) ? 31 : 23;
00030   mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(i)->m_Option->m_FontMapID = 1;
00031   mp_Dialog->setObjectText(i, buf);
00032  }
00033 }
00034 
00035 void COptions::processSpecific()
00036 {
00037  std::string buf;
00038 
00039  if(m_mustclose) // If menu is about to close save the options
00040  {
00041   CSettings Settings(mp_option);
00042   Settings.saveGameCfg();
00043  }
00044 
00045  if( m_selection != NO_SELECTION)
00046  {
00047   mp_option[m_selection].value = !mp_option[m_selection].value;
00048   buf = mp_option[m_selection].menuname + " ";
00049   buf += (mp_option[m_selection].value) ? 28 : 20;
00050   buf += (mp_option[m_selection].value) ? 29 : 21;
00051   buf += (mp_option[m_selection].value) ? 30 : 22;
00052   buf += (mp_option[m_selection].value) ? 31 : 23;
00053 
00054   mp_Dialog->setObjectText(m_selection, buf);
00055   m_selection = NO_SELECTION;
00056  }
00057 }
00058 
00059 COptions::~COptions() {
00060  if(mp_Dialog) delete mp_Dialog;
00061  mp_Dialog = NULL;
00062 }
